extendedInfo.description: This widget is a one-click shortcut to the Battery Use Indicator built into Android 1.6 and newer.The Battery Use Indicator gives you an idea of what is using up your battery.PLEASE NOTE: This is a widget, not an application, it can be added to your home screen by long pressing and selecting Widgets > Battery Use Widget

reviews.comment: Very useful shortcut. Definitely worth installing. Best used in conjunction with another graphing battery app (eg battery snap).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Widget linking to Android\'s battery usage \'thingy\'. Does exactly what it says and did exactly what I was looking for. A choice of icons would be good!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What I was looking for! Simple interface, comprehensive info. FREE. One of the most useful aps I have found.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great, just what I was looking for! Maybe include an option to set a user-defined label for the widget?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works but its pointless on my EVO 3D... No different from adding a shortcut to your home panels settings : battery uae
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Widget is a shortcut to standard Droid stats, doesn\'t add value. BatteryLeft is a better widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: For 2 months now ill uninstall it an reinstall it. I would even turn off my phone then turn it back on. And it still force close. 1/5.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work.
reviews.comment: I installed it on my HTC Wildfire  S.  The app manager lists it, but it does not show in the list of installed apps, so I cannot tom it.
reviews.author: Martin Thomas

reviews.comment: Installed successfully. Great apparently.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To daniel
reviews.comment: The developer already mention it in the details above... u have to read before u cry...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s just a shortcut to: Menu / Settings / Battery / Battery Use ... Not even really a widget.? - Too basic for me.!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t even open after I downloaded/installed it. Even tried to open from the Market under my downloads. Uninstalling....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hey retards read before installing! It says its a shortcut to your phones internal battery usage. Noobs!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great! Gives detailed breakdown on everything using battery power. Very helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty awsome. Lets me know what\'s draining my battery
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect! Exactly what i was looking for. Thanks Dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This widget is (or is identical to) the one aready on x10 through long pressing on the home screen and selecting shortcuts, settings, battery use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Chris, I\'ll keep that in mind for next version. Tammy it\'s a widget. Laura I never claimed it was anything other than what it is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tim, it\'s not the app\'s fault your phone is inaccurate with how long it\'s been unplugged. This app is only a shortcut to your phone\'s default batt use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not so useful on Vibrant since this phone allows you to make a shortcut to battery info. Might be useful on otherphones that can\'t do this
reviews.author: A Google User
